title: What did or does Eddie Van Halen think of Kurt Cobain? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know their thoughts of each other, but in contrast to what someone else posted about them kissing, this is what I read in an excerpt from Charles R. Cross's Heavier Than Heaven about them meeting at the end of 1993: The difference between sobriety and intoxication was never more clearly illustrated than on December 30, when Nirvana played a show at the Great Western Forum near Los Angeles. Filmmaker Dave Markey was videotaping that night and observed a display of inebriation so extreme, he turned his camera off in pity. And it wasn’t Kurt who was a mess—it was Eddie Van Halen. The famed guitar player was backstage on his knees drunk, begging Krist to let him jam. Kurt arrived only to see his one-time hero collapsing toward him with his lips puckered, like a toasted Dean Martin in a bad Rat-Pack skit. “No, you can’t play with us,” Kurt flatly announced. “We don’t have any extra guitars.” Van Halen didn’t grasp this obvious lie and pointed to Pat Smear, shouting, “Well, then let me play the Mexican’s guitar. What is he, is he Mexican? Is he black?” Kurt couldn’t believe his ears. “Eddie went into this racist, homophobic banter, typical redneck,” observed Dave Markey. “It was surreal.” Kurt was furious, but finally came up with a worthy verbal response: “Actually, you can jam,” he promised. “You can go onstage after our encore. Just go up there and solo by yourself!” Kurt stormed off. One thing to note is that Markey said Van Halen was a “typical redneck" whereas he was born and raised in the Netherlands. I had to share this because Kurt said not to believe everything you read, and here I'm surprised to see two opposite stories one where he's disgusted by EVH and another where he's literally kissing him on the lips.

I don’t know how true this is but there is a story that I’ve heard many times where Eddie Van Halen and Kurt Cobain did meet each other once. Kurt was nervous what Eddie would think of him but Eddie came up and gave Kurt a big kiss on the mouth! I think that means that he liked him. Edit: I just looked it up and apparently it was Kurt who kissed Eddie. But Eddie was hanging out in Kurt’s dressing room at a Nirvana show so I still think Eddie must’ve liked Kurt at least a little. https://metalheadzone.com/nirvanas-kurt-cobain-kisses-eddie-van-halen-on-the-mouth-story-has-been-exposed/
